dt: {bc}to engage in uninhibited often frenzied activities (such as intentional collision) with others near the stage at a rock concert

shortdef: to engage in uninhibited often frenzied activities (such as intentional collision) with others near the stage at a rock concert

dt: {bc}an area in front of a stage where very physical and rough dancing takes place at a rock concert

shortdef: an area in front of a stage where very physical and rough dancing takes place at a rock concert
